capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leading the development and evaluation of volunteer programs requires advanced skills in engaging, motivating, and developing the capabilities of volunteers.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Needs to effectively gain consensus and commitment from a wide range of stakeholders, including volunteers, community groups, and government agencies.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Responsible for planning and prioritizing volunteer programs and activities that align with NPWS goals and objectives.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Must collaborate with multi-disciplinary, cross-organisational project teams, internal and external stakeholders to achieve objectives.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Expected to achieve results through the effective management and implementation of volunteer programs.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for the management of associated risks and ensuring programs contribute to NPWS goals.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Requires advanced project management skills to coordinate volunteer programs, including planning, monitoring, and evaluating outcomes.

skills.name: Volunteer Program Development
skills.description: Developing, promoting, and evaluating volunteer programs to support conservation efforts.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Building and maintaining relationships with volunteers, community groups, and other stakeholders.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.description: Identifying and managing risks associated with volunteer programs and activities.

generalRole.title: Team Leader Volunteers
generalRole.description: This role involves leading the development, promotion, and evaluation of volunteer programs within the National Parks & Wildlife Service, requiring advanced skills in people management, project management, and stakeholder engagement to support conservation efforts.
